sections.code: @namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

html,.right-pane,.question-description,.entry-title,.answer-body,.show-answer,.show-answer h2,.show-answer p,.segmented-control a,#answer-content{background:none#222!important;color:#bbb!important;text-shadow:none!important;}

.answer-info,.filter,.vote-count,.back{background:none#222!important;color:#bbb!important;text-shadow:none!important;}

name: Bilibili 屏蔽广告 & 首页去除 舞蹈、生活、时尚、娱乐……分类区块

sections.code: *{transition-timing-function:ease;transition-duration:.25s;transition-property:border-color,background-color,color,box-shadow,opacity}
/*icon3*/.icon{background-image:url(http://wx2.sinaimg.cn/large/73508f0fgy1fmd28f7uz9j216o0z0jtj.jpg)}

.button{border-color:#276;background:#276}
.button:active,.button:hover{border-color:#298;background:#298}
